Scott Ryan

Projects

A collection of personal projects and interests grouped by category.

Categories

Cloud Disaster Recovery Framework

A multi-region AWS disaster recovery framework and reference architecture designed for small-to-medium enterprises. Focuses on low-cost snapshotting, cross-region replication, and automated failover playbooks.

 Cloud Storage

Experiments with personal storage and backup strategies.

 Vanessa’s Hallmark Generator

A playful AI-driven script generator that composes short romantic, feel-good scenes in a Hallmark-adjacent style. Built as an experiment in tone transfer and controlled prompts.

 Hiking

Trail logs, GPX tracks, and notes from favorite hikes.

 Lost Dutchman: Treasure Hunting & Map Finder

A small map-based tool and repository for locating historical sites, trailheads, and the Lost Dutchman area. Includes GPX overlays, map markers, and a finder utility to help plan visits.

 Mining

Prospecting notes and finds; small field reports and photos.

 The SRyter

An experimental story-bible and novel generator built with Gradio and lightweight versioning. The SRyter helps writers prototype characters, plot beats, and worldbuilding using seeded prompts and simple export options.
